member.name: T:System.Net.IWebProxyScript
member.summary: Provides the base interface to load and execute scripts for automatic proxy detection.

member.name: M:System.Net.IWebProxyScript.Close
member.summary: Closes a script.

member.name: M:System.Net.IWebProxyScript.Load(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Loads a script.
member.param: Internal only.
Internal only.
Internal only.
member.returns: A indicating whether the script was successfully loaded.

member.name: M:System.Net.IWebProxyScript.Run(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Runs a script.
member.param: Internal only.
Internal only.

member.name: T:System.Net.WebProxy
member.summary: Contains HTTP proxy settings for the class.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an empty instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI.
member.param: The URI of the proxy server.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified instance.
member.param: A instance that contains the address of the proxy server.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class using previously serialized content.
member.param: The serialization data.
The context for the serialized data.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI and bypass setting.
member.param: The URI of the proxy server.
true to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified host and port number.
member.param: The name of the proxy host.
The port number on Host to use.
member.exception: The URI formed by combining Host and Port is not a valid URI.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.Uri,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the instance and bypass setting.
member.param: A instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
true to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI, bypass setting, and list of URIs to bypass.
member.param: The URI of the proxy server.
true to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, false.
An array of regular expression strings that contain the URIs of the servers to bypass.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.Uri,System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified instance, bypass setting, and list of URIs to bypass.
member.param: A instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
true to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, false.
An array of regular expression strings that contains the URIs of the servers to bypass.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String[],System.Net.ICredentials)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI, bypass setting, list of URIs to bypass, and credentials.
member.param: The URI of the proxy server.
true to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, false.
An array of regular expression strings that contains the URIs of the servers to bypass.
An instance to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.#ctor(System.Uri,System.Boolean,System.String[],System.Net.ICredentials)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified instance, bypass setting, list of URIs to bypass, and credentials.
member.param: A instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
true to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, false.
An array of regular expression strings that contains the URIs of the servers to bypass.
An instance to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebProxy.Address
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of the proxy server.
member.returns: A instance that contains the address of the proxy server.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassArrayList
member.summary: Gets a list of addresses that do not use the proxy server.
member.returns: An that contains a list of arrays that represents URIs that do not use the proxy server when accessed.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of addresses that do not use the proxy server.
member.returns: An array that contains a list of regular expressions that describe URIs that do not use the proxy server when accessed.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.
member.returns: true to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.
member.returns: An instance that contains the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.
member.exception: You attempted to set this property when the property was set to true.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.GetDefaultProxy
member.summary: Reads the Internet Explorer nondynamic proxy settings.
member.returns: A instance that contains the nondynamic proxy settings from Internet Explorer 5.5 and later.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Populates a with the data that is needed to serialize the target object.
member.param: The to populate with data.
A that specifies the destination for this serialization.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.GetProxy(System.Uri)
member.summary: Returns the proxied URI for a request.
member.param: The instance of the requested Internet resource.
member.returns: The instance of the Internet resource, if the resource is on the bypass list; otherwise, the instance of the proxy.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed(System.Uri)
member.summary: Indicates whether to use the proxy server for the specified host.
member.param: The instance of the host to check for proxy use.
member.returns: true if the proxy server should not be used for host; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the are sent with requests.
member.returns: true if the default credentials are used; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.exception: You attempted to set this property when the property contains credentials other than the default credentials.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebProxy.System#Runtime#Serialization#ISerializable#GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Creates the serialization data and context that are used by the system to serialize a object.
member.param: The object to populate with data.
A structure that indicates the destination for this serialization.
